page.title: 08A day at H.M. Prison
page.content: 07.00 Prison Officers start work, and remand prisoners dress. 07.30 Remand prisoners breakfast, and convicted prisoners dress. 08.00 Convicted prisoners breakfast. All returned to cells. 08.30 Governor sees new arrivals, prisoners for release, prisoners with personal problems. 08.45 Remand prisoners prepared for court. Taken in Police van. 09.00 Prisoners start work-cleaning, woodwork, gardening, washing. 12.00 Inmates lunch, locked in cells. 13.30 Return to work. l6.30 Tea. Locked up. l7.00 Baths if requested. l9.00 Prisoners allowed recreation-. 2l.00 Locked in cells for the night.
